None.Name: Ice Bolt
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, tower shoots an ice bolt that deals 50 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 75 in total.

None.Name: Ice Shield
None.Description: Activate to apply Ice Shield on a friendly unit. Absorbs up to 690 damage for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
